name: kernel
description: Automate web browsers in the cloud with Kernel. Create browsers, execute Playwright code, deploy web agents, and control browser instances via CLI. Use when building browser automations or web scraping workflows.

plugins.name: kernel-cli
plugins.description: CLI commands for managing browsers, deploying apps, and controlling browser instances. Use when working with the kernel command-line tool.

plugins.name: kernel-sdks
plugins.description: TypeScript and Python SDK skills for building browser automation with Kernel's Typescript and Python SDKs. Use when writing code to control browsers programmatically.
